link_desc:
ORACLE MSSQL MYSQL DB2 & POSTGRESQL Databases Monitoring Version 7.0

You are welcome to download our ORACLE MSSQL MYSQL DB2 & POSTGRESQL Databases Monitoring OpenSource V7.0 Solution integrated in Zabbix 2.2 & 2.4. This new version mainly brings support of Zabbix 2.2 / 2.4 and the Databases Instances discovery. We thank you for any feedback, request or modification to alain@coreit.fr

The Zabbix Database Monitoring Version 7 is synchronized with Zabbix V2.2.x and is able to monitor Oracle (9, 10, 11), mysql (4, 5), mssql (MS SQL Server 2000, 2005, 2008 versions FR or US on Windows Servers FR or US), postgresql (8.x, 9.x ) & DB2 (8.x, 9.x ).
tags: database, monitoring, oracle, mysql, mssql, db2, postgresql
author: Alain Ganuchaud (Cool Monitoring - alain@coolmonitoring.fr )
